## Copilot PR Checklist

Before merging, verify:

- [ ] I read COPILOT_RULES.md
- [ ] This change touches fewer than 3 files
- [ ] No authentication changes
- [ ] No new hooks added
- [ ] No localStorage/window.crypto usage
- [ ] No state mutations
- [ ] All components return JSX or null
- [ ] I tested in Spark preview (not just local)
- [ ] I have a rollback plan
